summary: This week was mostly under-the-hood fixes: patched some UI bugs in the Markdown editor and swapped out the HTML sanitizer for something simpler. Also cleaned up a few lingering issues with CSRF tokens and duplicate tasks.

fixes: update ContentWithGutter to use dompurify instead of isomorphic-dompurify
resolve UI bugs in MarkdownEditor and CSRF token flow
docs: update TODOS.md with fixes for Personal TODOS
